Luffy and Nakama

Luffy

Monkey D. Luffy, also known as "Straw Hat Luffy".

Zoro

Roronoa Zoro, also known as "Pirate Hunter Zoro".

Nami

Nami is a young, normal-sized and slim girl.

Usopp

Usopp is the sniper.

Sanji

"Black Leg" Sanji is a pirate and the cook.

Chopper

Tony Tony Chopper is the doctor.

Robin

Nico Robin, is the archaeologist.

Franky

Franky is the shipwright.

Brook

Brook is the musician.
